ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.2.0 on 2024-11-30T20:44:42 [Issue ID 4000-97194] urn:comicvine:4000-97194
ComicInfo.Summary: FeFo#65 All Color!! Since Rurian Stardust has been on Earth, her career has been watched very closely by her home world. When word gets to them that Dusty has been fraternizing with a male Earth creature (David Burke) Rur's all-female society is thrown into revolution. Ever the opportunist, Rurian warlord Proxima see this as her ticket to great power, as she fans the flames of discontent, with a plan to bring the Rurian revolution to Earth. Earthquakes, floods and tidal waves wrack the Earth ahead of the Rurian invasion. Why? Because Proxima has used one of Stardust's old inventions to teleport the entire planet of Rur into orbit next to the Earth!!"My Sister, My Enemy, Part I", is written by Tillman Smoot, drawn by Dave Roberts and Mark Heike, and inked by Mark Heike and Chris Allen. It guest stars Buckaroo Betty, Jetgirl, David Burke, Aleyta, Miss Masque and The Avenger. More great "good girl art" and action. Then, in The Trial Of The Black Phantom, Part II- "Fear!"; Black Phantom is captured by frontier savages, beaten, tied to a stake, and about to have an arrow shot through her. How can she survive? Plotted by Mark Heike and Nick Northey, drawn by Northey, and inked by Nar Castro, Sonny delos Santos and Jordi Ensign. Color cover by Brad Gorby and Mark Heike, full color throughout. Standard comic book format.
ComicInfo.Title: The Trial of the Black Phantom Chapter Two: "Fear!"; My Sister... My Enemy!
